extension.dc:title: Chromosomes Count
extension.name: Chromosomes
extension.dc:description: Information about the number of chromosomes of a species

property.name: haploidCount
property.dc:description: Number of chromosomes counted in the haploid state

property.name: diploidCount
property.dc:description: Number of chromosomes counted in the diploid state. For polyploid organisms if known indicate the polyploidy in the remarks, but still use this term for the count in the sporophyte life stage

property.name: source
property.dc:description: Source reference for this chromosome count record. Can be a full literature citation, a webpage URL, DOI, etc.
property.examples: Goldblatt, P. 1984. Index to Plant Chromosome Numbers, 1979-1981. Monogr. Syst. Bot. Missouri Bot. Gard. 8: 1-427.

property.name: chromosomeRemarks
property.dc:description: Additional remarks for the count, e.g. if polyploidy is known
property.examples: "Cultivated Medicago sativa is tetraploid, with 2n=4x=32. Wild relatives have 2n=16" "76 autosomal and 2 sexual."
